name: Coop's Kiwi Bourbon
description: Not my original recipe; I'm sharing this with the blessing of its creator, /u/Coop34 of Reddit. It's a simple, beautiful balance of tart, sweet, and boozy and it is very dangerously addictive. Sharing because, when someone searches ATF for recipes using FA Kiwi, TFA Kentucky Bourbon, or TFA Toasted Marshmallow, this NEEDS to be in the search results.
author: ID10-T

reviews.text: Coop does amazing things with FA Kiwi. Both this and his Kiwi Cheesecake are absolutely not to be missed. Scrumptious and perfectly balanced.

The bourbon and toasted marshmallow really are a great pair, matched perfectly with the kiwi for what is a very simple, yet extremely tasty, vape. I try to always have some of this mixed up, it's delicious.

Would you believe it's June 2018 and I've only just tasted this for the first time? I've mixed it up twice, but both times gave my steeping bottles away to people I was trying to help quit smoking. I don't know what to say other than I just bought larger bottles of all three flavors, and I have a few versions steeping using other fruits. I'm also dying to know what the TFA KB & TFA TM will do to tobaccos. Just beautiful. Thank you for this, Coop. This'll be in my rotation forever.
This has been my ADV for a year. Cheap, easy, and delicious. You can swap in practically any fruit and get an equally good mix. TFA Apricot and CAP Honeydew are both awesome.
Awesome mix, once the Bourbon calmed down it does some magic stuff with the toasted marshmallow. The kiwi is up front with a really pleasant warm boozy exhale.

Stellar recipe, I wasn't expecting this out of 8% total flavoring and only 3 ingredients.  The marshmallow/bourbon combo is something magical, and the kiwi just blends perfectly.  It's worth trying simply for inspiration even if you think you won't like it. (It is amazing, btw)  Shout out to coop34 for this creation.  Thanks for the share ID10-T.

First ever DIY mix and ingredients were bought specifically for this recipe ... tested at 1 day steep and already I can tell this is going to get better - get a real kick from the bourbon which I imagine with another day or 2 steeping will mellow out and let the kiwi really come to the fore
Coop's Kiwi Cheesecake made me fall in love with FA Kiwi.  This only deepens that love.  The tartness is amazing.

Unbelievably delicious. Yet so simple. First recipe in my seven months of mixing that I've found I can vape all day and all night, without ever getting tired of it. Amazing work from Coop34. Thanks for sharing, ID10-T!

I just started DIY, and this was the first recipe I tried.  Discovered it on Reddit, read the reviews, and liked that fact that it was simple.  I've already blown through 30ml of it and have a 120ml batch resting now.  Love it!
FA Kiwi is such a great flavor, perfectly used here.
Wow, didnt realise how tasty FA kiwi is. Also think this ones better than the cheesecake although im not 100% sure yet
